column4: hey, everytime I try to play a video from mozilla I get (no picture)
rofl
new on irc too?
wow
!help mozilla plugins
!help mozilla video
what are you looking for?
I just wanna be able to play videos in mozilla, I've downloaded so many video players with synaptic.  But still nothing.
have you tried mplayer and mplayer plugin?
mozilla-mplayer, you probably want w32codecs as well, do you know how to get those?
you can get mozilla-mplayer from synaptic.  I will have the bot tell you about w32codecs
what do you mean?
yes, that means you won't be able to use w32codecs
there are two options that I know of, chroot and comoiling vlc with support for wmv
yep
how difficult is that?  I think you said you've never done it before?
nope, never done it
any idea where I could find a help page on how to do it?  I'm reading into it right now and it says it's done by using a linux vserver
I've seen a guide on the forum, you can try the wiki too.  ubuntuforums.org wiki.ubuntu.com
thanks for the help jason
